category: Hardware, software or communications equipment andfacilities
description: System hardware is rendered incapable of facilitating current businessobjectives.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Allocate a proportion of staff time to monitoring the ongoingsuitability of repository hardware and assessing the potentialvalue of emerging technologies
- Evaluate effects of system changes prior to their implementation
- Pre-empt hardware failure with anticipatory investment In the event of risk’s execution:
- Seek formal assurances or SLAs from hardware suppliers orproviders of third-party hardware services
name: Hardware failure or incompatibility
notes:
- Are policies and procedures in place to monitor the adequacyof hardware technologies amid changing community requirements and external influences?
- What service level guarantees are offered from third-party hardware service providers?
- Is a proportion of staff time allocated to determining the ongoing suitability and operational functionality of hardware?
preMitigationNotes: - Server’s power supply burns out, rendering hardware unusable
